title: Tempeh "Scramble" with Kale and Cabbage
directions: Heat a wok. Add sesame oil and crush some dried red chilies into the oil. Next, add the tempeh, kale, cabbage and garlic and toss about for a few minutes until the kale has wilted. Season with crushed Sichuan peppercorns, and lightly drizzle soy sauce. Careful not to add too much or it will taste too salty. Toss for a couple of minutes and plate with a slide of sliced avocado. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds.
ingredients: frozen), crumbled or diced into small pieces
mix of thinly sliced ribbons of kale and green cabbage
